Hyunsu Mun

  • Current position: Ph.d student at Chungnam National University, Daejeon, Korea
  • Looking for `Jr. Network traffic measurement researcher'
  • Major: Computer science, Computer network
  • Research topic:
    1. AppSpeedXray: Mobile application performance measurement and analysis
    2. VASpeedTest: Voice assistant performance measurement and analysis
    3. Privacy exposure at web community
    4. Building a ip geolocation database using web community data
    5. Personal journal logging at edge using home router
    6. Shared public bicycle data analysis
